org.sdm.spa.actors.transport

Class LocalFileCopier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sdm.spa.actors.transport.FileCopierBase
      • org.sdm.spa.actors.transport.LocalFileCopier

  • public class LocalFileCopier
extends FileCopierBase
    Default class for copying files within the localhost.This class doesn't have have any specific implementation. All methods in turn call the Parent class' copyLocal method.
    Author:
    D3X140

                                             java.lang.String srcFile,

                                             boolean recursive)
                                      throws ExecException
        Description copied from class: FileCopierBase
        Copies file from a remote host to local machine
        Specified by:
        copyFrom in class FileCopierBase
        Parameters:
        srcDetails - - object containing the source machine connection details
        srcFile - - source file to be copied
        destFile - - local path into which source should be copied
        recursive - - flag to indicate if directories should be copied recursively
        Returns:
        CopyResult object containing the exit code and error message if any. exit code 0 represents successful file transfer.
        Throws:
        ExecException

      • getDefaultPort

        protected int getDefaultPort()
        Description copied from class: FileCopierBase
        default port for the file transfer protocol. Child class should either return a specific port number or -1 if it doesn't want to enforce a specific port number
        Specified by:
        getDefaultPort in class FileCopierBase
